title: Bootstrap Alerts
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Feedback Messages
Alerts provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions.

### Styles
Uses the standard theme colors: `.alert-success`, `.alert-danger`, etc.

### Dismissing
Add `.alert-dismissible` and a close button `btn-close` inside to allow users to close the alert.
